My press conference with Pdt @Poroshenko in #Kiev starting now http://t.co/90tlLcJd4Q
This visit to #Kiev means a lot to me. It is a symbol of Europe's support to #Ukraine's sovereignty and unity.
#Situation in Ukraine remains very fragile. Ceasefire is a positive step. However it is still insufficient to guarantee sustainable #peace.
We have discussed how to best achieve progress with a sustainable political solution to the conflict.
This is our primary goal and concern. There is no military solution for this conflict.
We have full confidence in President's #Poroshenko efforts. We call on the #Russian side to show the same commitment to peace.
We do not hesitate to decisively respond to #Russia's unacceptable behaviour. We have stepped up pressure by deepening restrictive measures.
The number of displaced people in eastern #Ukraine has more than doubled during the past 3 weeks. Y'day @EU_Commission mobilised €22mn aid.
Our message is clear. We stand by #Ukraine's sovereign choices. And stand by #Ukraine's #European path. Not a threat to no one.

Opening ceremony of the Special Olympics European Summer Games in #Belgium: 'we are very happy to welcome 2000 athletes from all over Europe'
'We are here to applaud the athletes, support their talent and promote diversity' @SOBelgium # SO2014
'I would like to congratulate the many Belgian volunteers and companies who are helping with the organization of these Games' # SO2014
'Breaking taboos and prejudice can not be ordered. It needs a lot of patience, courage and generosity '# SO2014
'I am convinced that these Special Olympics Games can and will change the way people are looking for and talking about mental disabilities'
Spreading this message of tolerance and respect is essential. This is why these Special Olympics Games are so important '# SO2014
'To all the athletes and their delegations: welcome to #Belgium and have wonderful Games!' @SOBelgium # SO2014

The murder of David Haines is an act of pure evil. My heart goes out to his family who have shown extraordinary courage and fortitude.
We will do everything in our power to hunt down these murderers and ensure they face justice, however long it takes.
